      Sets the roles which can use this command with
      Does not take any effect when the command sent in private
      void setRoleSource(org.javacord.api.entity.server.Server server)
      Sets the server where the roles will be fetched from
      This is useful when we want to check the roles at a private command Safe to use when the command is registered in only one server

      • setRoles

        public void setRoles(boolean needAllRole,
                     org.javacord.api.entity.permission.Role... roles)
        Sets the roles which can use this command with
        Does not take any effect when the command sent in private
        Parameters:
        needAllRole - if true all roles will needed to use this command
        roles - the list of the roles

      • setRoleSource

        public void setRoleSource(org.javacord.api.entity.server.Server server)
        Sets the server where the roles will be fetched from
        This is useful when we want to check the roles at a private command

        Safe to use when the command is registered in only one server

        Parameters:
        server - the server
